00024 void TTEApplicationBase::executeCallback(Callback *cb){
00025     Enter_Method("executeCallback(cb)");
00026     cb->executeCallback();
00027 }

00029 void TTEApplicationBase::handleParameterChange(const char* parname){
00030     buffers.clear();
00031     if(ev.isGUI()){
00032         //TODO check why this does not work
00033         getDisplayString().setTagArg("i2", 0, "");
00034         getDisplayString().setTagArg("tt", 0, "");
00035     }
00036     std::string buffersString = par("buffers").stdstringValue();
00037     std::vector<std::string> bufferPaths;
00038     split(buffersString,',',bufferPaths);
00039     for(std::vector<std::string>::iterator bufferPath = bufferPaths.begin();
00040             bufferPath!=bufferPaths.end();bufferPath++){
00041         cModule* module = simulation.getModuleByPath((*bufferPath).c_str());
00042         if(module){
00043             Buffer *buffer = dynamic_cast<Buffer*> (module);
00044             if(buffer && buffer->hasPar("ct_id")){
00045                 buffers[buffer->par("ct_id").longValue()].push_back(buffer);
00046             }
00047         }
00048         else{
00049             if(ev.isGUI()){
00050                 ev<<"Configuration problem: Module "<<(*bufferPath)<<" could not be resolved or is no CT-Buffer (TT or RC)!"<<endl;
00051                 getDisplayString().setTagArg("i2", 0, "status/excl3");
00052                 getDisplayString().setTagArg("tt", 0, "WARNING: Configuration Problem Application Buffer!");
00053             }
00054         }
00055     }
00056 }
00057 
00058 } //namespace
